mapper.sql: ID, FLOW_ID, PRCS_ID, PRCS_TYPE, PRCS_NAME, SET_LEFT, SET_TOP, FEEDBACK, AUTO_TYPE, USER_FILTER, TIME_OUT, TIME_OUT_MODIFY, TIME_OUT_ATTEND, SIGNLOOK, TOP_DEFAULT, USER_LOCK, SYNC_DEAL, SYNC_DEAL_CHECK, TURN_PRIV, CHILD_FLOW, GATHER_NODE, ALLOW_BACK, ATTACH_PRIV, AUTO_BASE_USER, REMIND_FLAG, DISP_AIP, TIME_OUT_TYPE, ATTACH_EDIT_PRIV, ATTACH_EDIT_PRIV_ONLINE, ATTACH_MACRO_MARK, VIEW_PRIV, SIGN_TYPE, COUNTERSIGN, WORKINGDAYS_TYPE

PRCS_USER, PRCS_ITEM, HIDDEN_ITEM, REQUIRED_ITEM, PRCS_DEPT, PRCS_PRIV, PRCS_TO, PLUGIN, PLUGIN_SAVE, PRCS_ITEM_AUTO, PRCS_IN, PRCS_OUT, PRCS_IN_SET, PRCS_OUT_SET, AUTO_DEPT, AUTO_USER_OP, AUTO_USER, AUTO_USER_OP_RETURN, AUTO_USER_RETURN, USER_FILTER_PRCS_PRIV, USER_FILTER_PRCS_PRIV_OTHER, USER_FILTER_PRCS_DEPT, USER_FILTER_PRCS_DEPT_OTHER, MAIL_TO, MAIL_TO_DEPT, MAIL_TO_PRIV, CONDITION_DESC, RELATION_IN, RELATION_OUT, CONTROL_MODE, LIST_COLUMN_PRIV, FILEUPLOAD_PRIV, IMGUPLOAD_PRIV
mapper.select: select Id,PRCS_ID,PRCS_TO,PRCS_NAME from flow_process where FLOW_ID=#{flowId}
select a.* ,b.FlOW_NAME as flowName from flow_process a,flow_type b where a.FLOW_ID=b.FLOW_ID and b.FLOW_ID=#{flowId}
mapper.insert: insert into flow_process (ID, FLOW_ID, PRCS_ID, PRCS_TYPE, PRCS_NAME, SET_LEFT, SET_TOP, FEEDBACK, AUTO_TYPE, USER_FILTER, TIME_OUT, TIME_OUT_MODIFY, TIME_OUT_ATTEND, SIGNLOOK, TOP_DEFAULT, USER_LOCK, SYNC_DEAL, SYNC_DEAL_CHECK, TURN_PRIV, CHILD_FLOW, GATHER_NODE, ALLOW_BACK, ATTACH_PRIV, AUTO_BASE_USER, REMIND_FLAG, DISP_AIP, TIME_OUT_TYPE, ATTACH_EDIT_PRIV, ATTACH_EDIT_PRIV_ONLINE, ATTACH_MACRO_MARK, VIEW_PRIV, SIGN_TYPE, COUNTERSIGN, WORKINGDAYS_TYPE, PRCS_USER, PRCS_ITEM, HIDDEN_ITEM, REQUIRED_ITEM, PRCS_DEPT, PRCS_PRIV, PRCS_TO, PLUGIN, PLUGIN_SAVE, PRCS_ITEM_AUTO, PRCS_IN, PRCS_OUT, PRCS_IN_SET, PRCS_OUT_SET, AUTO_DEPT, AUTO_USER_OP, AUTO_USER, AUTO_USER_OP_RETURN, AUTO_USER_RETURN, USER_FILTER_PRCS_PRIV, USER_FILTER_PRCS_PRIV_OTHER, USER_FILTER_PRCS_DEPT, USER_FILTER_PRCS_DEPT_OTHER, MAIL_TO, MAIL_TO_DEPT, MAIL_TO_PRIV, CONDITION_DESC, RELATION_IN, RELATION_OUT, CONTROL_MODE, LIST_COLUMN_PRIV, FILEUPLOAD_PRIV, IMGUPLOAD_PRIV) values (#{id}, #{flowId}, #{prcsId}, #{prcsType}, #{prcsName}, #{setLeft}, #{setTop}, #{feedback}, #{autoType}, #{userFilter}, #{timeOut}, #{timeOutModify}, #{timeOutAttend}, #{signlook}, #{topDefault}, #{userLock}, #{syncDeal}, #{syncDealCheck}, #{turnPriv}, #{childFlow}, #{gatherNode}, #{allowBack}, #{attachPriv}, #{autoBaseUser}, #{remindFlag}, #{dispAip}, #{timeOutType}, #{attachEditPriv}, #{attachEditPrivOnline}, #{attachMacroMark}, #{viewPriv}, #{signType}, #{countersign}, #{workingdaysType}, #{prcsUser}, #{prcsItem}, #{hiddenItem}, #{requiredItem}, #{prcsDept}, #{prcsPriv}, #{prcsTo}, #{plugin}, #{pluginSave}, #{prcsItemAuto}, #{prcsIn}, #{prcsOut}, #{prcsInSet}, #{prcsOutSet}, #{autoDept}, #{autoUserOp}, #{autoUser}, #{autoUserOpReturn}, #{autoUserReturn}, #{userFilterPrcsPriv}, #{userFilterPrcsPrivOther}, #{userFilterPrcsDept}, #{userFilterPrcsDeptOther}, #{mailTo}, #{mailToDept}, #{mailToPriv}, #{conditionDesc}, #{relationIn}, #{relationOut}, #{controlMode}, #{listColumnPriv}, #{fileuploadPriv}, #{imguploadPriv})

mapper.update:
update flow_process
FLOW_ID = #{flowId},
PRCS_ID = #{prcsId},
PRCS_TYPE = #{prcsType},
PRCS_NAME = #{prcsName},
SET_LEFT = #{setLeft},
SET_TOP = #{setTop},
FEEDBACK = #{feedback},
AUTO_TYPE = #{autoType},
USER_FILTER = #{userFilter},
TIME_OUT = #{timeOut},
TIME_OUT_MODIFY = #{timeOutModify},
TIME_OUT_ATTEND = #{timeOutAttend},
SIGNLOOK = #{signlook},
TOP_DEFAULT = #{topDefault},
USER_LOCK = #{userLock},
SYNC_DEAL = #{syncDeal},
SYNC_DEAL_CHECK = #{syncDealCheck},
TURN_PRIV = #{turnPriv},
CHILD_FLOW = #{childFlow},
GATHER_NODE = #{gatherNode},
ALLOW_BACK = #{allowBack},
ATTACH_PRIV = #{attachPriv},
AUTO_BASE_USER = #{autoBaseUser},
REMIND_FLAG = #{remindFlag},
DISP_AIP = #{dispAip},
TIME_OUT_TYPE = #{timeOutType},
ATTACH_EDIT_PRIV = #{attachEditPriv},
ATTACH_EDIT_PRIV_ONLINE = #{attachEditPrivOnline},
ATTACH_MACRO_MARK = #{attachMacroMark},
VIEW_PRIV = #{viewPriv},
SIGN_TYPE = #{signType},
COUNTERSIGN = #{countersign},
WORKINGDAYS_TYPE = #{workingdaysType},
PRCS_USER = #{prcsUser},
PRCS_ITEM = #{prcsItem},
HIDDEN_ITEM = #{hiddenItem},
REQUIRED_ITEM = #{requiredItem},
PRCS_DEPT = #{prcsDept},
PRCS_PRIV = #{prcsPriv},
PRCS_TO = #{prcsTo},
PLUGIN = #{plugin},
PLUGIN_SAVE = #{pluginSave},
PRCS_ITEM_AUTO = #{prcsItemAuto},
PRCS_IN = #{prcsIn},
PRCS_OUT = #{prcsOut},
PRCS_IN_SET = #{prcsInSet},
PRCS_OUT_SET = #{prcsOutSet},
AUTO_DEPT = #{autoDept},
AUTO_USER_OP = #{autoUserOp},
AUTO_USER = #{autoUser},
AUTO_USER_OP_RETURN = #{autoUserOpReturn},
AUTO_USER_RETURN = #{autoUserReturn},
USER_FILTER_PRCS_PRIV = #{userFilterPrcsPriv},
USER_FILTER_PRCS_PRIV_OTHER = #{userFilterPrcsPrivOther},
USER_FILTER_PRCS_DEPT = #{userFilterPrcsDept},
USER_FILTER_PRCS_DEPT_OTHER = #{userFilterPrcsDeptOther},
MAIL_TO = #{mailTo},
MAIL_TO_DEPT = #{mailToDept},
MAIL_TO_PRIV = #{mailToPriv},
CONDITION_DESC = #{conditionDesc},
RELATION_IN = #{relationIn},
RELATION_OUT = #{relationOut},
CONTROL_MODE = #{controlMode},
LIST_COLUMN_PRIV = #{listColumnPriv},
FILEUPLOAD_PRIV = #{fileuploadPriv},
IMGUPLOAD_PRIV = #{imguploadPriv}
where ID = #{id}
